Text: Alhambra:  "The Red One"), the complete Arabic form of which was "Qalat Al-Hamra", is a palace and fortress complex located in Granada, Andalusia, Spain.

Triplets:
<Alhambra
3:
--------------------
<Text: Alhambra:  It was converted into a royal palace in 1333 by Yusuf I, Sultan of Granada.>
Triplets:<Alhambra
5:
--------------------
Text: Alhambra:  In 1526 Charles I & V commissioned a new Renaissance palace better befitting the Holy Roman Emperor in the revolutionary Mannerist style influenced by Humanist philosophy in direct juxtaposition with the Nasrid Andalusian architecture, but which was ultimately never completed due to Morisco rebellions in Granada.
Triplets:<Alhambra
